analyzed: sarvam avidyā mūlam saṃsāra taru prakāra vaicitryam

original: jñātum vaktuṃ hantuṃ kaḥ śakto 'nyatra sarvajñāt // KAvk_75.1 //
analyzed: jñātum vaktum hantum kaḥ śaktaḥ nyatra sarvajñāt

original: śrāvastyāṃ svastimān pūrvaṃ jino jetavane sthitaḥ /
analyzed: śrāvastyām svastimān pūrvam jinaḥ jetavane sthitaḥ
aśeṣa darśī bhagavān bhikṣu saṃgham abhāṣata
śṛṇuta śreyase jñāna āloka nirmala mānasāḥ
pratītyasamutpādam vaḥ kathayāmi yathākramam
avidyā vāsanā evā iyam duḥkha skandhasya bhūyasaḥ
tad pratyayaḥ tu saṃskārāḥ kāya vāc mānasa ātmakāḥ
saṃskāra uttham ca vijñānam manaḥ ṣaṣṭha indriya ātmakam
tad pratyayam nāma rūpam saṃjñā saṃdarśana abhidham
manaḥ ṣaṣṭha indriya sthānam ṣaṣ āyatanam api atas
ṣaṣ āyatana saṃśleṣaḥ sparśaḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: ṣaṭsparśānubhavo yaś ca vedanā sā prakīrtitā // KAvk_75.7 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ sparśa anubhavaḥ yaḥ ca vedanā sā prakīrtitā
tayā viṣaya saṃkleśa rāgāt tṛṣṇā prajāyate
kāma ādiṣu tat udbhūtam upādānam pravartate
nānā yoni parāvṛttyā jātiḥ bhava samudbhavā
jarā maraṇa śoka ādi saṃtatiḥ jāti saṃśrayā
pratītya utpādaḥ yam bahu gatiḥ avidyā kṛta padaḥ
sa cintyaḥ yuṣmābhiḥ vijana vana viśrāma śamibhiḥ

original: parijñātaḥ samyag vrajati kila kālena tanutāṃ
analyzed: parijñātaḥ samyak vrajati kila kālena tanu tām

original: tanutvaṃ saṃprāptaḥ sukhataranivāryaś ca bhavati // KAvk_75.11 //
analyzed: tanu tvam saṃprāptaḥ sukhatara nivāryaḥ ca bhavati
iti kṣemendra viracitāyām bodhisattva avadāna kalpalatāyām
pratītyasamutpāda avadānam pañcasaptatitamaḥ pallavaḥ
